description: General information, for example ordering and manufacturer information

contents.name: ManufacturerName
contents.description: Legally valid designation of the natural or judicial body which is directly responsible for the design, production, packaging and labeling of a product in respect to its being brought into the market.

contents.name: ManufacturerProductDesignation
contents.description: Product designation as given by the mnaufacturer. Short description of the product, product group or function (short text) in common language.

contents.name: ManufacturerPartNumber
contents.description: Unique product identifier of the manufacturer for the product type respective the type designation of the industrial equipment.

contents.name: ManufacturerOrderCode
contents.description: Unique product identifier of the manufacturer sufficient to order the exact same product.
